item.title: White House East Wing demolition nearly complete to make room for Trump ballroom
item.description: Trump said Wednesday that the 90,000 square foot ballroom will cost $300 million, higher than the original estimated price tag of $200 million.

item.title: Trump terminates all U.S. trade negotiations with Canada over Reagan tariffs TV ad
item.description: President Trump claimed Canada had ran an ad featuring former President Ronald Reagan talking about tariffs to influence a pending U.S. Supreme Court ...

item.title: Trump to meet China's Xi for the first time in second term as trade deal remains elusive
item.description: The confirmation of a Trump-Xi meeting signaled an intent to de-escalate tensions and put negotiations back on track, analysts said.

item.title: Prosecutor told DOJ there's not enough evidence to indict Trump foe Sen. Adam Schiff: MSNBC
item.description: The Justice Department has already charged two other leading Trump foes, James Comey and Pam Bondi, after the president urged that they be prosecuted.

item.title: NBA coach Chauncey Billups, Miami Heat player Terry Rozier arrested in federal gambling cases
item.description: Two major federal gambling prosecutions rocked the NBA, ensnaring the Portland Trail Blazers head coach, and alleged Mafia members.
